scan(Activity) - Static method in class com.bnotions.vicinity.Vicinity

Defaults to type "TEXT_TYPE".
shareText(CharSequence, CharSequence) - Method in class com.bnotions.vicinity.util.IntentIntegrator
Shares the given text by encoding it as a barcode, such that another user can scan the text off the screen of the device.
startMonitoring() - Method in class com.bnotions.vicinity.DeviceAbsImpl
This method should not have to be called and only should be called if a connection fails or resets.
stopMonitoring() - Method in class com.bnotions.vicinity.DeviceAbsImpl
This will stop the monitoring of the connection for changes in state and for received messages.
